EmailTemplate.name: J Shoop July 24
EmailTemplate.subject: How to Become the Top Lender in the Minds of Realtors, CPA's, and Financial Planners with J Shoop
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
How To Become the Top Lender in the Minds of Realtors, CPA's, and Financial Planners with J. Shoop from B of I Federal Bank
Join us for a Webinar on July 24
Join National Account Executive J. Shoop to learn how to have three simple, purposeful conversations with Realtors and other strategic partners so that they are calling you first when they need a lender.
Title:
How To Become the Top Lender in the Minds of Realtors, CPA's, and Financial Planners with J. Shoop from B of I Federal Bank
Date:
Thursday, July 24, 2014
Time:
11:30 AM - 12:00 PM PDT
After registering you will receive a confirmation email containing information about joining the Webinar.
System Requirements PC-based attendees Required: Windows® 8, 7, Vista, XP or 2003 Server
Mac®-based attendees Required: Mac OS® X 10.6 or newer
Mobile attendees Required: iPhone®, iPad®, Android™ phone or Android tablet
Space is limited. Reserve your Webinar seat now at: https://www4.gotomeeting.com/register/169962599
